title: 1.27 Judges II: Victory into Defeat
itunes:title: Judges II: Victory into Defeat
description: The Book of the Rescuers was the heroic story of the northern Israelites. The later editors of Judges were all southern Judeans. They inverted the northern stories, turning triumph into disaster.
content:encoded: The Book of the Rescuers was the heroic story of the northern Israelites. The later editors of Judges were all southern Judeans. They inverted the northern stories, turning triumph into disaster.
itunes:subtitle: Southern Judeans transform northern Israelite successes into failures
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
